Canvas ASSIGNMENT: How effective has the Springfield community been in identifying and solving big problems? (4pts)

Read these reports in order to get a sense of how our community identifies and addresses big challenges. Don't just focus on the environmental stuff, it's all connected!

1. Over the last five years, what are the THREE most impressive accomplishments identified in the Springfield Community Focus Reports?

2. Over the last five years, what are THREE specific challenges we have been unable to address? Why do these stand out for you?
